Name: Corona Samurai
About the game: This is your chance to get personal revenge on the infamous virus. It's coming for your village in untold numbers, but with just your swords and shurikens, you'll show the world how it's really done. FEATURES - Story Mode in three difficulties - Party Mode - Survival Mode in three difficulties, limited, and unlimited options - Collect in-game currencies and achievements to unlock new weapons - Online leaderboard to show off your scores and compete against people from around the world Stay tuned for more!
